string-array.item: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

string-array.name: movie_descriptions
string-array.item: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, The Batman is forced to investigate the city\'s hidden corruption and question his family\'s involvement.

Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire\'s world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.
The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.
